backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor that includes blob storage mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two menu‑data update features and affected files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH theme tokens for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with favicon, SEO meta tags, OG/Twitter tags, and app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, layout, and all page routes including search.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Reusable logo component with image fallback to text-based mark.
frontend/src/components/GalleryImage.tsx: Image card with loading pulse, hover effects, and graceful error fallback.
frontend/src/components/HeaderSearch.tsx: Search input + button component that submits trimmed query.
frontend/src/components/LogoMotif.tsx: Decorative logo motif with opacity and fallback text mark.
frontend/src/components/MenuCategoryCaro: Carousel for menu categories with swipe, keyboard nav, and price formatting.
frontend/src/components/MenuScreenshotGa: Renders a gallery showing the first menu screenshot with loading and error handling states.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Provides a styled section wrapper with configurable classes and a container for layout consistency.
frontend/src/components/Seo.tsx: Updates document title and meta/OG tags dynamically based on provided SEO props.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays the site footer with brand info, social links, navigation, and contact sections.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements the site header with navigation, search, action buttons, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/WatermarkBackgro: Shows layered low-opacity repeating watermark backgrounds for visual depth.
frontend/src/data/menuData.ts: Defines menu category and item data structures and exports a full menu dataset.
frontend/src/draft24-exclusions.md: Documents which changes were excluded during restoration to Draft 24 and lists included features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and returns an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and manages invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHorizontalSwipe.ts: Provides a ref that detects horizontal swipe gestures and triggers optional left/right handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login state, identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks with no current logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, font imports, and light/dark theme CSS variables for the app.
frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts: Exports centralized paths for brand images and a predefined gallery images list.
frontend/src/lib/globalSearchContent.ts: Builds search results for menu items, offers, and pages using normalized text matching.
frontend/src/lib/menuPdf.ts: Empty module reserved for future menu PDF logic.
frontend/src/lib/menuPrice.ts: Formats menu item prices, supporting numeric values, labels, and fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/menuScreenshotAssets.ts: Exports an ordered list of menu screenshot asset URLs for deterministic page viewing.
frontend/src/lib/socialLinks.ts: Provides a central set of social media URLs for the site.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata, story content, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page with hero section, restaurant contact details, quick actions, and map layout.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Empty or placeholder gallery page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage displaying hero content, cuisine sections, CTAs, and feature highlights for the restaurant.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Menu page with search, menu screenshots, filtered categories, and ordering CTA.
frontend/src/pages/OffersPage.tsx: Offers page listing promotional deals with styled cards and a terms section.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Global search page that queries menu, offers, and pages, displaying grouped results with navigation.
frontend/src/types/pdf-lib-global.d.ts: Empty type declaration placeholder for pdf-lib global types.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, content scanning, extended colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, tracking menu‑data update features and new requests for syncing menu content and verifying search behavior.
